snippet: Dmitriy Frenkel, who contracted polio as a child, needs expensive custom-made shoes for his disfigured foot. But Medicaid no longer covers the cost.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty, a beneficiary of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Dmitriy Frenkel buy custom shoes for his disfigured foot.
lead_paragraph: Dmitriy Frenkel, who contracted polio as a child, needs expensive custom-made shoes for his disfigured foot. But Medicaid no longer covers the cost.

headline.seo: Wearing Special Shoes on an Arduous Journey
headline.main: Wearing Special Shoes on an Arduous Journey
headline.print_headline: Wearing Special Shoes on an Arduous Journey
